title: The Winter Cold
content:
I have never experienced a winter in my country. I wonder how cold it is. They say snowstorm is the worst. So cold you can’t even feel the tip of your finger.

I tried putting my index finger into the freezer. It hurts. Not only on the tip, but the cold spread to my entire hand. 

Does that mean the storm is so cold, you can’t even feel that you are in pain?
